channel.title: 5 Tips stopping your email address being spammed
channel.description:
[b]Copied this from another forum so ignore the background color for the image[/b]
1) use a image instead of text if you put your email address on a website/forum like this:-
[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/3493/image3gp8.png[/img]
^^^ try copy that :)
2) use [at] instead of @ with spaces between like this:-
j.webmonster [at] gmail.com
3) put text in the middle of the email like this:-
j.webmREMOVE-THIS-!!!onster@gmail.com
4) put commas, dots, question marks and tell the viewer to remove them like this:-
j.web.monst!!er.@gmail!.com
5) get GMAIL here http://www.bytetest.com/ :icon_king: has a spam filter
abit too late for my old email lol..
[img]http://img293.imageshack.us/img293/8505/omgspammedrh5.png[/img]

item.title: 5 Tips stopping your email address being spammed
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

actualy my hotmail is spammed(by microsoft) (I even have all the [free] stupid offers that they have in the settings, yet: i have no choice to not recieve their emails and msn living crap.)

Read full topic

item.title: 5 Tips stopping your email address being spammed
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“mvp566, post:4, topic:39410”]i think with only 1k emails your lucky, i got email bombed

<>

Thank goodness for a Delete All button[/quote]
What exactl is email bombed? And where can I download one? I want to ubber bomb someone from my school…

Read full topic

item.title: 5 Tips stopping your email address being spammed
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

mangoman500:

couldnt u just type a fake one or your arch enemies?like u tell u gf your enemies, then they get a email, “o baby, i luv u so much”, then it will be funny.or just do something random like uianbkjsgblak [ a t ] poopsiedoodlemanisfunnyboyatthefatpplofdoomageofthefatpplohyapplpwnlikefat.green

QUIT SMOKING CRACK.

i just make a new email account every couple months with the exception of one email address I’ve had no problems with.

Read full topic

item.title: 5 Tips stopping your email address being spammed
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

Most smart spambots can figure out the [at] and RemoveThis[!]

They also strip nonalphanumeric characters. Most don’t have OCR though

Read full topic
item.source: 5 Tips stopping your email address being spammed

item.title: 5 Tips stopping your email address being spammed
item.dc:creator: @regecks1 regecks`
item.description:
@regecks1 wrote:

[quote=“Mmmk, post:6, topic:39410”][quote author=KC link=topic=55376.msg686680#msg686680 date=1167159132]

i think with only 1k emails your lucky, i got email bombed

<>

Thank goodness for a Delete All button

HE HE unlucky for all those e-mails. I havent got any spam yet but I do have a spam killer from Mcaffe so maybe that has stopped a few things. Also that is annoying because it blocks nearly everything (forum emails, registration emails and lots more)
[/quote]
Use thunderbird and turn the spam filter on ;)[/quote]Lol, still wasting your bandwidth, gogo turn on filter on ISP/mail host side.

Read full topic
